title: This laptop stand that’ll knock out all those ergonomic aches and pains is now under $100
content:
Macworld

Using laptops can cause you to hunch over your computer, creating bad posture habits that lead to assorted aches and pains. If you’d like to promote a healthier work setup, consider the CASA Hub Stand Pro, an innovative solution designed to enhance the productivity and comfort of MacBook users. This 6-in-1 hub is now under $100, thanks to a limited-time Presidents’ Day sale.

Crafted from durable aluminum, this stand elevates a laptop by up to nearly a foot, allowing users to create a more comfortable and ergonomically sound working position that cuts down on neck and back strain. The CASA Hub’s stand itself features a 360-degree rotating base with easy angle adjustment, as well as an anti-slip grip to situate your laptop securely

Compatible with M1 and M2 MacBooks, as well as the full iPad series, this stand has another secret weapon: 6 multi-function ports. That means all your device’s connectivity needs are covered, even when you’re away from the stand base itself. There’s even an HDMI 4K 60Hz output port for connecting your laptop or tablet to a large-screen monitor or TV for optimal viewing.

Revolutionize your workspace with the 6-in-1 CASA Hub Stand Pro USB-C Laptop Stand, now just $94.97 during the Presidents’ Day savings event through February 19 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific.
